name: Sneak & Steal 🥷🏻
description:
What is the Game about?🤔
🏃🏻The Game is a Spiritual Successor to an old Game called 'SneakThief'🏃🏻
it's fast paced Robbing where you try to sneak around the cops and get the Cash!👮

What's Next?🎁
Sadly the Game is already fully completed,
there's no future plan's with the Game at this moment..
But there will be small updates to the existing content!
